classes.description: A device or piece of equipment designed to perform specific household tasks.

properties.name: applianceName
properties.description: The name of the home appliance.

properties.name: brand
properties.description: Brand or manufacturer of the appliance.

properties.name: type
properties.description: Type or category of the appliance (e.g., refrigerator, microwave).

properties.name: energyRating
properties.description: Energy efficiency rating for the appliance.

properties.name: isSmartDevice
properties.description: Whether the appliance can be controlled via smart technologies.

properties.name: duration
properties.description: Duration of the warranty in months.

properties.name: coverage
properties.description: Details on what is covered under the warranty.
